mapper.insert: insert into member1(m1_num, m1_email, m1_pwd, m1_sleep) values(m1_seq.nextVal, #{m1_email}, #{m1_pwd}, 0)
mapper.update: update member1 set m1_lastlogin = sysdate where m1_email= #{m1_email}
mapper.select: select m1_email, m1_num, m1_pwd from member1 where m1_email=#{m1_email} and m1_pwd = '${m1_pwd}'
select nvl(count(*), 0) from member1 where m1_email=#{m1_email}
